data.basic2: To rotate, press the respective button in the left/right corner of the screen. To close the door, click on it. To watch any camera feed, open the monitor by clicking on its screen and click on the respective camera. To zoom out press the button that appeared on the bottom-left corner.
data.floppa2: Floppa will go from room to room randomly. To prevent him from killing you, monitor cameras 1 to 9, if he appears on either camera 1 or 9, close the door immediately! He will kill you otherwise, he has a chance of not going away, and instead staying at the door, he will laugh when this happens. Active from Night 1 to 5
data.popcat2: Pop Cat will appear on the camera you switched to with a random chance. You should immediatly switch to a different camera, or else he will kill you. On some nights he will kill you if you look at his camera and he hasn't left it yet. Active on night 2, 4 and 5.
data.bingus2: Bingus will go in this order of cameras: 3 -> 5 -> 2 -> 1. If he is on the camera 1 and you don't make him retreat, he will kill you immediatly. To make him stay in current camera or retreat, look at him for some time. Active on Nights 3 to 5.
data.killp:
Kill if you look 
at his camera again
